title: Talks: a Natimuk Primary School animation
creator_credit: Dave Jones and Natimuk Primary School
brief_description: A collaboration between students from Natimuk Primary School and animation artists Dave Jones funded as part of the Arts Victoria Artists in Schools program. Hand drawn crayon drawings are animated and Combined with recorded soundgrabs from the kids to make an engaging sequence of simple, colourful character studies!
